name: HallowQueen [DEMO]
description:
Play as Brie, a witch-in-training who must defeat SweetTooth, a sentient candy bag, from eating all the post-Halloween discounted candy from the local sweets shop!

Unfortunately, there are more sinister creatures that Brie must face in her adventure!

More content to come! (Currently only a single boss is available but more bosses are in the works!)

Looking forward to hearing feedback from players and will make changes + adjustments based on feedback.

Hope you had a Happy Halloween for 2022! :D

NOTE: Gamepad controls recommended!

>>> Controls:

> GAMEPAD: 

- D-Pad/ Left Analog Stick: Movement

- Up Button/ Stick: Aim Upwards

- A Button: Jump

- RT Button: Shoot

- LB/ LT Button: Dash

- Press Y: Shift To Next Weapon

- Hold Y: Hold Up + Move To Select Weapon

- Start Button: Pause

> Keyboard:

- R Key: Restart Fight

- WASD/ Arrow Keys: Movement

- W/ Up Key: Aim Upwards

- Space Bar: Jump

- Press/ Hold Key: Shoot

- Shift Key: Dash

- Press E Key: Change Weapon

- Hold E Key: Change Weapon + Move To Select Weapon

- Enter Key: Pause
